page.title: 13SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: There are three terms in the school year. The Autumn term begins in September and ends in December; January to late March or early April is the Spring term; Summer term is from April to July. Some of the main events in the school's calendar are its Harvest Festival in October, Christmas Activities, Decorated Easter Egg Competition, Sports Day and annual Summer Concerts. Every opportunity is taken to welcome parents and visitors into school, to help and join in with some of the work that is being done.
